fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Throughout the month of December 2023 until Christmas Day, roles will be posted daily based off of an earlier poll https://discord.com/channels/970041597590929519/970051770342588467/1154908187141619723
- Each member is notified of how many people are naughty (kill capable) and nice (everyone else) at the start of the game.
